oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One person not to stand over another in the early morning. By =girri-sse (L VII.-1. 6045 and 6046). A fragment of the account of what happens when one stands in the early morning. 1) This story is found in Book VII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A fragment of the story of the early morning
